author: Confucius
message: I hear and I forget. I see and I remember. I do and I understand.
title: Thought of the day

author: Will Durant
message: The trouble with most people is that they think with their hopes or fears or wishes rather than with their minds.
title: Thought of the day

author: Chuck Norris
message: A lot of people give up just before theyre about to make it. You know you never know when that next obstacle is going to be the last one.
title: Thought of the day

author: Lauren Raffo
message: Sometimes the biggest act of courage is a small one.
title: Thought of the day
